attributes.action: Change the London Olympic branding for 2012
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo and branding that has been unveiled does not present Britian in a manner that we would wish.  It take no account of how cultural differences in other countries will interpret it.  It is reminiscent of poor 80's 'yoof' culture programmes.  It has been develoloped by the London elite and therefore does not resonate with the rest of the country from which the organising committee looks to gather support.  As such it is an embarrassement globally and irrelevant locally.  It needs to go now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
